citations.narrative:
Records have not been updated to include newly added dogs and cats. All live dogs and cats must be properly identified
in accordance with this section of the regulations. Records must be updated and maintained in order to reflect the current
animal inventory.
********Correct by April 10, 2022

There was an excessive amount of clutter and construction debris found in many areas throughout the facility. Unused old
flooring, scrap metal, and miscellaneous piles of debris was observed, with some piles stored adjacent to and on top of
animal enclosures. Clutter and debris can serve as a breeding ground for pests and vermin. Pests can spread diseases
and can potentially have a negative impact on the health of the animals. The facility must correct this issue.
*********Correct by May 15, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(a)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Records have not been updated to include newly added dogs and cats. All live dogs and cats must be properly identified 
in accordance with this section of the regulations. Records must be updated and maintained in order to reflect the current 
animal inventory. 
********Correct by April 10, 2022 
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
There was an excessive amount of clutter and construction debris found in many areas throughout the facility. Unused old 
flooring, scrap metal,  and miscellaneous piles of debris was observed, with some piles stored adjacent to and on top of 
animal enclosures. Clutter and debris can serve as a breeding ground for pests and vermin.  Pests can spread diseases 
and can potentially have a negative impact on the health of the animals.  The facility must correct this issue. 
*********Correct by May 15, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
End Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
